snippet: In November, Roll Call and CQ Today will become a single daily newspaper called Roll Call and will merge both newsrooms, which have already been working alongside each other.
abstract: In November, Roll Call and CQ Today will become a single daily newspaper called Roll Call and will merge both newsrooms, which have already been working alongside each other.

headline.main: Roll Call and CQ Today to Merge Into One Paper
headline.print_headline: Roll Call and CQ Today To Merge Into One Paper
